cast.overview: When college coach Herb Brooks is hired to helm the 1980 U.S. men's Olympic hockey team, he brings a unique and brash style to the ice. After assembling a team of hot-headed college all-stars, who are humiliated in an early match, Brooks unites his squad against a common foe: the heavily-favored Soviet team.
cast.title: Miracle

cast.overview: Jerry Maguire used to be a typical sports agent: willing to do just about anything he could to get the biggest possible contracts for his clients, plus a nice commission for himself. Then, one day, he suddenly has second thoughts about what he's really doing. When he voices these doubts, he ends up losing his job and all of his clients, save Rod Tidwell, an egomaniacal football player.
cast.title: Jerry Maguire

details.biography: Al Michaels was born on November 12, 1944 in Brooklyn, New York, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for BASEketball (1998), Jerry Maguire (1996) and Miracle (2004).
details.name: Al Michaels
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
